Label: Event name
Description: The name of or headline for a promotional event or series of events which relate to the product. This element is mandatory within each instance of the <PromotionalEvent> composite, and repeatable to provide parallel names for a single event in multiple languages. The language attribute is optional for a single instance of <EventName>, but must be included in each instance if <EventName> is repeated.
Format: <dd>Variable length text, suggested maximum length 200 characters</dd>
Example: <x516>Meet the Writer: Daniel Handler (aka Lemony Snicket)</x516>
